charges.charge_description: BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to a term of imprisonment of 108 months on Counts One and Three, plus 120 months on Count Two, to be served consecutively for a total of 228 months, followed by a term of 5 years Supervised Release on Counts one and Three, plus 2 years on Count Two, to run concurrently. $300 Special Assessment. No fine. $10,663.00 Restitution.

No fine. $10,663.00 Restitution.
